channel.title: LetterXchange - Buy and sell newsletters
channel.description: Hi! We are building LetterXchange.com. LetterXchange is the online platform for buying and selling newsletter businesses. We firmly believe in the thriving community of newsletter entrepreneurs. Hence we are building LetterXchange to facilitate market discovery and secure transactions. More updates coing soon!
